casebody.data:
E. J. BROOKS COMPANY, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. AMERICAN CASTING & MFG. CORP., Defendant-Appellee. No. 713, Docket 35597. United States Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Argued April 13, 1971. Decided April 13, 1971. Edward Halle, New York City, for defendant-appellee. Robert Henderson, Francis J. Pisarra, New York City, for plaintiff-appellant.

Before WATERMAN, SMITH and KAUFMAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

The judgment below is affirmed in open court on the findings of fact and conclusions of law of Judge Dooling below.
